--- In gladiator@y..., "oldschool518" <johnnyoldschool@e...> wrote:
> well.. archers..
> 
> i'd have to say barrage of exploding bolts would be overpowering, 
> pure and simple.

And rapid single exploding bolts aren't?  I can summon (with an 
archmage) an archer which can fire exploding bolts incredibly fast.  
Of course, the attack can only be used long-range.


> for a fourth ability i'm thinking that the archers should have 
> a "snipe", wherein they shoot one arrow that can go through walls 
> (windows, as it were) as well as trees. this arrow would go faster 
> than normal arrows and be much more powerful. it would also cost a 
> mad amount of mana and go straight as an arrow.

Interesting.  If there was a single arrow that could do that, I would 
want to attach the ability to "lock on target".
